name: Custard Forecast
title: What Custard System Is Moving Through You?
description: Answer five quick prompts, then match your flavor personality to what is available near you now.

options.label: Clear morning blue
options.commentary: Clear morning blue -- calm and collected, no storm in sight

options.label: Fast-moving storm bands
options.commentary: Fast-moving storm bands -- you thrive in high-energy systems

options.label: Golden sunset haze
options.commentary: Golden sunset haze -- warm, nostalgic, a little romantic

options.label: Electric night clouds
options.commentary: Electric night clouds -- restless energy looking for somewhere to go

options.label: 20-35F, crisp and focused
options.commentary: Crisp and focused -- you think clearest when it's cold out

options.label: 36-55F, cool and breathable
options.commentary: Cool and breathable -- the sweet spot where you feel most alive

options.label: 56-75F, balanced and sunny
options.commentary: Balanced and sunny -- you like things easy and warm

options.label: 76+F, hot and high energy
options.commentary: Hot and high energy -- you run at full blast

questions.prompt: Which texture pattern sounds best right now?

options.label: Crunch and snap
options.commentary: Crunch and snap -- you want something with an edge to it

options.label: Ribbon swirl and layers
options.commentary: Ribbon swirl and layers -- you appreciate complexity done right

options.label: Smooth and creamy
options.commentary: Smooth and creamy -- no distractions, just the pure thing

options.label: Loaded with mix-ins
options.commentary: Loaded with mix-ins -- why pick one thing when you can have everything

options.label: Breathe, triage, and stabilize
options.commentary: Breathe, triage, stabilize -- the methodical type under pressure

options.label: Rally the group and move fast
options.commentary: Rally the group -- you turn chaos into a team sport

options.label: Improvise and test options
options.commentary: Improvise and test -- broken plans are just new experiments

options.label: Return to trusted playbooks
options.commentary: Return to playbooks -- comfort in what has worked before

questions.prompt: Pick your ideal weekend weather plan.

options.label: Trail day and fresh air
options.commentary: Trail day -- you need to move to think clearly

options.label: Friends, games, and loud laughter
options.commentary: Friends and games -- the weekend is for the people you love

options.label: Long brunch with good conversation
options.commentary: Long brunch -- slow mornings with the right company

options.label: Solo recharge and deep focus
options.commentary: Solo recharge -- quiet hours are how you refuel

questions.prompt: Which forecast window feels most like you?

options.label: Sunrise reset
options.commentary: Sunrise reset -- you start early and steady

options.label: Afternoon momentum
options.commentary: Afternoon momentum -- you build speed through the day

options.label: Golden hour social
options.commentary: Golden hour social -- connection matters most

options.label: Midnight experiment
options.commentary: Midnight experiment -- you do your best work off-script

questions.prompt: During a storm warning, your role is...

options.label: Read the radar and call it early
options.commentary: Radar reader -- your plans are precise

options.label: Grab supplies and keep moving
options.commentary: Supply runner -- you prefer action

options.label: Check in on everyone
options.commentary: Group check-in -- people first, always

options.label: Find a new route and pivot
options.commentary: Route finder -- uncertainty is your playground

options.label: Flat and stable
options.commentary: Flat and stable -- consistency wins

options.label: Slow rise, steady focus
options.commentary: Slow rise -- intentional progress

options.label: Quick drop, big energy
options.commentary: Quick drop -- you thrive in high pressure

options.label: Swingy and unpredictable
options.commentary: Swingy and unpredictable -- the fun starts in chaos

options.label: Find coffee and a window seat
options.commentary: Window seat -- introspective and warm

options.label: Keep running, no excuses
options.commentary: Keep running -- momentum over comfort

options.label: Text friends to make it fun
options.commentary: Invite friends -- weather is better together

options.label: Take a detour and discover something new
options.commentary: Detour discovery -- surprises feed you

options.label: Winter into spring
options.commentary: Winter into spring -- patient optimism

options.label: Spring into summer
options.commentary: Spring into summer -- full-throttle energy

options.label: Summer into fall
options.commentary: Summer into fall -- warm depth and balance

options.label: Fall into winter
options.commentary: Fall into winter -- sharp air, sharp focus

questions.prompt: Which cloud ceiling fits your vibe?
How do you handle weather alerts?

options.label: Adapt the route on the fly
Go now and figure it out
